title: Fix speaker-name-edit-focus.spec.ts in HEADLESS Electron (avoid fill/datalist crash)
Migrate E2E tests to shared Electron instance
description:
Created shared Electron helper in tests/helpers/shared-electron.ts.
Migrated tests/vtt-editor.spec.ts as proof of concept.

Results: 7 tests run in 1.9s (vs ~5s+ if each launched its own instance)

Migration pattern:
1. Replace imports:
   ```ts
   // Before
   import { test, expect, _electron as electron } from '@playwright/test'
   
   // After  
   import { sharedElectronTest as test, expect } from './helpers/shared-electron'
   ```

2. Remove beforeEach/afterEach that launch/close Electron
3. Change test signature to receive `{ page }` or `{ electronApp, page }`
4. Replace `window.` with `page.`

Tests that need their own Electron instance (ASR tests, file-save tests that need fresh state):
- tests/electron/asr-*.spec.ts
- tests/electron/file-save-*.spec.ts  
- tests/electron/unsaved-changes.electron.spec.ts

title: Broken Python snapshot tests in test_vtt_lib.py
description:
Two Python snapshot tests are failing in test_vtt_lib.py:
- test_parse_vtt_file
- test_serialize_vtt

Both are assertion errors comparing snapshots. May need to regenerate snapshots with:
```
cd transcribe && uv run pytest tests/test_vtt_lib.py --snapshot-update
```
